plugins.name: QR Generator
plugins.description:
Generate crisp, scannable QR codes directly in Figma—for free. Whether you’re linking to a website, product, or prototype, it’s never been easier to add functional codes to your designs.


Need more than just the basics? Unlock the ability to fully customize your QR codes:

– Adjust colors to match your brand

– Tweak corner and eye styles

– Control padding, sizing, and error correction

– Apply your own design language


Perfect for teams and designers who want their work to look as good as it works.

Use it for client presentations, posters, packaging, or anything else where detail matters.


Free to generate. Paid to make it yours.


You can contact us at support@easestud.io

visit easestud.io
plugins.tagline: Simple QR codes, beautifully yours.

plugins.name: Section Auto-Resize with 200px Margin
plugins.description:
This plugin automatically resizes Figma Sections to fit their content and adds a 200px margin around the content area. It's designed to help teams maintain consistent spacing and layout rules without manually adjusting section boundaries.


Perfect for teams working with grid systems, spacing standards, or design system alignment workflows.

plugins.name: Reverse Variable Order
plugins.description:
Easily reverse the order of your variable values with


  1. Select your collection
  2. Select the target mode or all modes
  3. Enter the path to a group of variables
  4. Reverse


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Plugin Notes

  1. Variable names and paths are case sensitive.
  2. Updating variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate.


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Flip the order of values in your variable groups

132291.name: Reverse Variable Order
132291.description:
Easily reverse the order of your variable values with


  1. Select your collection
  2. Select the target mode or all modes
  3. Enter the path to a group of variables
  4. Reverse


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Plugin Notes

  1. Variable names and paths are case sensitive.
  2. Updating variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate.


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.
132291.tagline: Flip the order of values in your variable groups

plugins.name: Figma 2 FRIDA
plugins.description: Users can select Figma frames to automatically generate clean, functional code for Flutter, React, Kotlin and Angular, with the code adapting to the specific data within the frames. This includes not only the UI components but also layout structures and other relevant data. Additionally, the tool provides the ability to generate automated test cases based on the generated code, helping ensure quality and functionality. For app deployment, users can generate the necessary icon files tailored for various platforms, simplifying the process for app deployment across different app stores and environments.
plugins.tagline: Generate code for both mobile and web based on Figma UI designs.

131649.name: Figma 2 FRIDA
131649.description: Users can select Figma frames to automatically generate clean, functional code for Flutter, React, Kotlin and Angular, with the code adapting to the specific data within the frames. Additionally, the tool provides the ability to generate automated test cases based on the generated code, helping ensure quality and functionality. For app deployment, users can generate the necessary icon files tailored for various platforms, simplifying the process for app deployment across different app stores and environments.

networkAccess.reasoning: To access Firebase services and external APIs

131649.tagline: Generate code for both mobile and web based on Figma UI designs.

plugins.name: SuperLayer (copy)
plugins.description:
SuperLayer (copy) lets you quickly view and copy the names of selected layers in your Figma file or FigJam board. It’s ideal for generating UI inventories, documentation, or simply organizing your layer structure. The plugin also shows each layer’s type and a thumbnail preview when available.


To use it, select one or more layers on your canvas and launch the plugin. A clean list view will appear with sorting options and checkboxes to include or exclude layers. Click the Copy button to copy all selected layer names to your clipboard, formatted line by line. The list updates automatically as you change your selection.


SuperLayer is optimized for speed and simplicity. It does not currently support exporting full metadata, nested hierarchy structures, or annotations. Thumbnails are generated when possible, but may not appear for certain FigJam elements or complex Figma nodes.
plugins.tagline: Copy Figma and FigJam layer names with ease. Sortable and perfect for docs, audits, and checklists

131488.name: SuperLayer (copy)

To use it, select one or more layers on your canvas and launch the plugin. A clean list view will appear with sorting options and checkboxes to include or exclude layers. Click the Copy button to copy all selected layer names to your clipboard, formatted line by line. The list updates automatically as you change your selection.


SuperLayer is optimized for speed and simplicity. It does not currently support exporting full metadata, nested hierarchy structures, or annotations. Thumbnails are generated when possible, but may not appear for certain FigJam elements or complex Figma nodes.
131488.tagline: Copy Figma and FigJam layer names with ease. Sortable and perfect for docs, audits, and checklists

plugins.name: SaveFrame - Save, Share, and Manage Custom Frames with Ease.
plugins.description:
SaveFrame — Figma Frames, Re imagined!


Tired of Figma’s default frame window? SaveFrame is your modern visual command center for everything frames.

Custom frames, Organize, preview, customize, delete, and share—like never before.


Whether you're documenting designs, building moodboards, or curating visual systems, SaveFrame gives you full creative control. It's what Figma frames should feel like.


✨ Why designers love SaveFrame:


🔍 Instant Frame Previews

  1. No more clicking around. See all your frames at a glance in a clean, scrollable UI.

🧩 Drag & Drop Organization

  1. Sort, group, and build collections effortlessly. Your canvas, your logic.

🧹 Smart Deletion

  1. Clear out what you don’t need—instantly. Delete single frames or full sets with confidence.

📐 Save All the Details

  1. Dimensions, effects, layout, constraints—SaveFrame remembers the stuff that matters.

🎨 Reusable Frame Presets

  1. Create your own frame styles and apply them in one click. Keep your design patterns consistent.

🚀 Seamless Sharing

  1. Export and import frame collections in seconds.
  2. Perfect for sharing with teammates or individuals—no friction, no confusion.

⭐ Favorite Key Frames

  1. Highlight your best work and access it instantly when it counts.

🌗 Light & Dark Mode

  1. A workspace that adapts to your vibe, day or night.



🛠 Built for designers who:

  1. Want more control than Figma gives out of the box
  2. Create and manage multiple frames daily
  3. Build moodboards, docs, and design systems
  4. Hate clutter and love visual clarity
  5. Need a fast way to share organized frames with collaborators


In short:

We took the idea of Figma frames and made it flexible, collaborative, and creator-first.

SaveFrame isn’t just a tool—it’s a better way to work with frames.
plugins.tagline: Figma Frames, Reimagined — Save, Share, and Manage Custom Frames with Ease.

plugins.name: Sustainalyzer
plugins.description:
Sustainalyzer helps you evaluate the ecological impact of your Figma designs. It detects design elements that conflict with the Web Sustainability Guidelines (WSG) and scientific research on digital sustainability.


The plugin checks for the following sustainability issues:


  1. Avoid videos, particularly autoplay or background media
  2. Minimize image use, especially large or excessive images
  3. Optimize images for size, format, and scaling
  4. Avoid third-party services (e.g. embeds, maps, social widgets)
  5. Avoid decorative elements that add visual weight without purpose
  6. Limit font variants to reduce font file size
  7. Prefer system fonts over custom fonts
  8. Reduce complexity by limiting the number of elements
  9. Disable animation autoplay to reduce processor load
  10. Consider older devices, avoiding effects that degrade performance or compatibility
  11. Use a design system to support reuse and reduce redundancy
  12. Choose energy-efficient colors, especially for large UI areas


Each guideline is tagged with an impact level—high, medium, or low—indicating its potential contribution to emissions. You can filter the results by impact level to focus on the most critical issues.


To use Sustainalyzer, simply select the elements you want to analyze and run the plugin.
plugins.tagline: Check your designs for sustainability issues based on the Web Sustainability Guidelines.

plugins.name: Fig-Refactor
plugins.description:
Call for Sponsorship: Support the Development


Fig-Refactor – Replace Spacing with Figma Variables in One Click


Fig-Refactor is a Figma plugin designed to bring structure and scalability to your design files by replacing hardcoded gaps and paddings with Figma variables — in bulk.


Fig-Refactor intelligently scans your selection or entire file, matches raw spacing values to the closest variable from your local or team library, and replaces them with a single click. It even skips values already using variables, keeping your workflow non-destructive and efficient.


✨ Features:

  1. 🔍 Smart matching – Suggests the closest variable for each spacing value
  2. 🧠 Supports team libraries – Load and use variables from shared libraries
  3. 📁 Flexible scanning – Target specific selections or scan the entire file
  4. 🚫 Non-destructive – Ignores values already assigned to a variable


Currently in active development, Fig-Refactor is already making design systems cleaner and easier to manage — and with your support, it can go even further. Your sponsorship helps fund ongoing development, bug fixes, and new features like auto-thresholds, preview modes, and batch review.


📹 DEMO

❤️ Support this project


Your support helps keep this plugin alive and evolving.

Thank you for making design better for everyone!
plugins.tagline: Refactor Your  Figma Spacing  in Seconds

plugins.name: View Jumper
plugins.description: View Jumper helps designers quickly navigate large Figma files by creating visual bookmarks. Users set two key locations (View A and View B) that they need to reference frequently, then instantly teleport between them with preserved zoom levels and page context. Whether using the UI buttons, menu commands, or keyboard shortcuts, this plugin eliminates the frustration of constantly scrolling and searching through complex designs, making workflow significantly more efficient when comparing or referencing different areas.

accepted.name: Christopher
accepted.description:
Product Design @ heyo.is
Brand Design @ MARKoftheBRAND.com

plugins.tagline: Set viewpoints A & B. Teleport between design locations with a click.

plugins.name: Export Icon to Compose
plugins.description: Export Icon to Compose is a Figma plugin that lets you export selected vector objects as SVG and instantly convert them into clean, production-ready Jetpack Compose code for Android UIs. It automatically extracts the object's name, dimensions, and processes all <path> elements using the integrated svg-path-parser library. This streamlined workflow saves time, reduces manual coding errors, and improves your design-to-code process.
plugins.tagline: Export your Figma icons as SVG and generate clean, ready-to-use Jetpack Compose code for Android UIs

130138.name: Export Icon to Compose

It automatically extracts the object's name, dimensions, and processes all <path> elements using the integrated svg-path-parser library. This streamlined workflow saves time, reduces manual coding errors, and improves your design-to-code process.
130138.tagline: Export your Figma icons as SVG and generate clean, ready-to-use Jetpack Compose code for Android UIs

plugins.name: TOC Please - Auto TOC Generator
plugins.description:
A plugin that helps you easily explore and manage complex Figma pages by generating a Table of Contents (TOC).


Features

1. In-plugin TOC generation

  1. Automatically collects frames with a specified prefix to generate a TOC
  2. Currently sorts frames based on their X-axis position on the Figma canvas (support for layer order coming soon)
  3. Click items to instantly navigate to the corresponding frame
  4. Supports up to 2 levels of nested items


2. Canvas TOC generation

  1. Create a TOC frame directly on the Figma canvas
  2. The TOC frame is fully customizable to suit your needs.
  3. When TOC content changes, simply select the TOC frame and click “Update” to refresh the content while preserving your custom styles.
plugins.tagline: Auto-generate a TOC from frames with a specific prefix. Click items to quickly navigate.

128139.name: TOC Please - Auto TOC Generator
128139.description:
A plugin that helps you easily explore and manage complex Figma pages by generating a Table of Contents (TOC).


Features

  1. Automatically collects frames with a specified prefix to generate a TOC
  2. Currently sorts frames based on their X-axis position on the Figma canvas (support for layer order coming soon)
  3. Click items to instantly navigate to the corresponding frame
  4. Supports up to 2 levels of nested items


2. Canvas TOC generation

  1. Create a TOC frame directly on the Figma canvas
  2. The TOC frame is fully customizable to suit your needs.
  3. When TOC content changes, simply select the TOC frame and click “Update” to refresh the content while preserving your custom styles.
128139.release_notes: Optimized speed of extracting frames for TOC
128139.tagline: Auto-generate a TOC from frames with a specific prefix. Click items to quickly navigate.

plugins.name: Renamer
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that helps you keep your layers organized by automatically generating descriptive names based on their properties. Perfect for maintaining clean and consistent layer naming across your designs.


Automatically renames layers based on their properties:

  1. Shows dimensions (width × height)
  2. Displays color information (HEX codes)
  3. Shows opacity values
  4. Indicates effects (shadows, blurs)
  5. Shows constraints
  6. Includes corner radius information
  7. Includes stroke details
  8. Reflects Auto Layout properties


Select layers and run the plugin to rename them according to your settings.

accepted.name: Pavel
accepted.description: Product designer with 5+ years of experience in web and mobile UI.

plugins.tagline: Smart & seamless layer renaming

131546.name: Renamer
131546.description:

131546.release_notes: Fixed: Text layers with applied text styles are now correctly renamed.

plugins.name: Round Off
plugins.description:
This plugin helps avoid the Figma export bug where any decimal values in a frame's position values are are rounded up on export, resulting in a subpixel white line on the sides of your exported PNGs.


Apply to all top-level frames or to just to frames selected and remove all decimal values from the x and y positions before export.


Never see that white line again!
plugins.tagline: Avoid PNG export bugs by rounding off all decimals from your top level frames' position values.

130230.name: Round Off
130230.description:
This plugin helps avoid the Figma export bug where any decimal values in a frame's position values are are rounded up on export, resulting in a subpixel white line on the sides of your exported PNGs.


Apply to all top-level frames or to just to frames selected and remove all decimal values from the x and y positions before export.


Never see that white line again!
130230.tagline: Avoid PNG export bugs by rounding off all decimals from your top level frames' position values.

plugins.name: Holy Shade
plugins.description:
Holy Shade - A Color Matching Challenge! 🎨


Test your color perception skills with Holy Shade, a fun and engaging game designed for designers, artists, and color enthusiasts! 🖌️


🔍 How to Play:


A target color is displayed at the top.


Choose the matching shade from the options below.


The closer your choice, the higher your score!


💡 Why Play?


Improve your color differentiation skills.


Sharpen your ability to recognize subtle shade variations.


Challenge yourself and compete for the highest score!


Are you ready to master the art of color perception? 🌈✨
plugins.tagline: A Color Matching Challenge!

125103.name: Holy Shade
125103.description:
Holy Shade - A Color Matching Challenge! 🎨


Test your color perception skills with Holy Shade, a fun and engaging game designed for designers, artists, and color enthusiasts! 🖌️


🔍 How to Play:


A target color is displayed at the top.


Choose the matching shade from the options below.


The closer your choice, the higher your score!


💡 Why Play?


Improve your color differentiation skills.


Sharpen your ability to recognize subtle shade variations.


Challenge yourself and compete for the highest score!


Are you ready to master the art of color perception? 🌈✨

plugins.name: Find & Replace Anything
plugins.description:
Search for anything on your page and replace it with anything you want!


A powerful tool for finding and replacing styles! Works with components, instances and library styles. Especially helpful to align parameters across projects in bulk like auto layout or library styles for your pixel perfect design.


Plugin is in active development. Therefore, any feedback is appreciated! Like our plugin? Leave a heart!


Full feature list:


Library & local Styles

  1. Fonts
  2. Colors
  3. Effects
  4. Grids

Auto Layout

plugins.name: Export to Denada
plugins.description:
Effortlessly create, customize, and refine HTML emails in seconds with Denada. Your brand. Your voice. Your rules. It's like magic.


This plugin is the easiest way to export your Figma designs into Denada.


How to Export Images to Denada:


  1. In Figma, select a layer to export, then right-click > Plugins > Export to Denada
  2. Name the image, paste in Denada API Token then Export to Denada
  3. The exported image will now appear in your Denada image collection


The image is linked.


  1. If you alter your image on Figma, just export it again and click "update available" in Denada


How to get a Denada API Token:


  1. In Denada, go to Settings (User must be a manager or higher)
  2. Click Create Token, Name Token
  3. Copy Token
plugins.tagline: Export your Figma assets to Denada's image library, in one click.

121997.name: Export to Denada
121997.description:
Effortlessly create, customize, and refine HTML emails in seconds with Denada. Your brand. Your voice. Your rules. It's like magic.


This plugin is the easiest way to export your Figma designs into Denada.


How to Export Images to Denada:


  1. In Figma, select a layer to export, then right-click > Plugins > Export to Denada
  2. Name the image, paste in Denada API Token then Export to Denada
  3. The exported image will now appear in your Denada image collection


The image is linked.


  1. If you alter your image on Figma, just export it again and click "update available" in Denada


How to get a Denada API Token:


  1. In Denada, go to Settings (User must be a manager or higher)
  2. Click Create Token, Name Token
  3. Copy Token
121997.release_notes: Allow exporting any layer, not just Frame layers.
121997.tagline: Export your Figma assets to Denada's image library, in one click.

plugins.name: Figmata
plugins.description: Figmata is a tool that brings data visualization into the Figma environment, letting designers map data directly onto design elements with live, visual feedback. Unlike rigid chart tools like Excel or Illustrator, Figmata enables custom, flexible, and interactive graphics—integrated into the design systems designers already use. It lowers the barrier to entry compared to D3 by working within Figma's component-based structure and offering code autocompletion for advanced users. Figmata supports CSV/JSON input, direct manipulation of visual properties, and saves state for iterative work. It bridges the gap between data and UI design, making data-rich interfaces more intuitive and design-friendly.
plugins.tagline: Data-driven design directly in Figma

130087.name: Figmata
130087.description: Figmata is a tool that brings data visualization into the Figma environment, letting designers map data directly onto design elements with live, visual feedback. Unlike rigid chart tools like Excel or Illustrator, Figmata enables custom, flexible, and interactive graphics—integrated into the design systems designers already use. It lowers the barrier to entry compared to D3 by working within Figma's component-based structure and offering code autocompletion for advanced users. Figmata supports CSV/JSON input, direct manipulation of visual properties, and saves state for iterative work. It bridges the gap between data and UI design, making data-rich interfaces more intuitive and design-friendly.

  2. Personal account with subscription management and action history
  3. Data encryption and protection of user tokens


Fits:

  2. Developers of landing pages and interfaces
  3. To the authors of design systems

plugins.name: Feed Names, Get Frames (16:9, 1280x720)
plugins.description:
This plugin allows to batch-create 1280*720px (16:9) frames with user-defined names.


The frames will be created in the centre of the viewport, unless something is in the way — in this case it will place them to the bottom right of the conflicting element, and the frames created will remain selected for further batch manipulation. Frame size works well for YouTube thumbnails.


Useful for established design workflows, especially centred around YouTube design, with high volumes and short turnaround times.


Assuming that 1 manual frame creation+naming takes 5 seconds, then for 10 frames the plugin increases the efficiency by x50. And even more for a larger number of frames.

accepted.name: Alexandra (Sasha) Hunter
accepted.description: I do graphic and product design.

plugins.tagline: Paste a list of titles — get frames with those titles

125014.name: Feed Names, Get Frames (16:9, 1280x720)
125014.description:
This plugin allows to batch-create 1280*720px (16:9) frames with user-defined names.


The frames will be created in the centre of the viewport, unless something is in the way — in this case it will place them to the bottom right of the conflicting element, and the frames created will remain selected for further batch manipulation. Frame size works well for YouTube thumbnails.


Useful for established design workflows, especially centred around YouTube design, with high volumes and short turnaround times.


Assuming that 1 manual frame creation+naming takes 5 seconds, then for 10 frames the plugin increases the efficiency by x50. And even more for a larger number of frames.
125014.tagline: Paste a list of titles — get frames with those titles

plugins.name: Layout Aware Renaming
plugins.description:
Features

- Auto-Detect Grids: Automatically detects rows and columns in your selection.

- Custom Naming: Add prefixes and choose between numeric or alphabetic suffixes.

- Manual Override: Specify exact rows/columns when auto-detection fails.

- Mixed Sizes: Works with elements of different sizes in the same grid.

- Figma & FigJam: Compatible with both Figma and FigJam (limited support).
plugins.tagline: Automatically rename elements based on their grid layout.

plugins.name: Maruco
plugins.description:
What is this?

Maruco is a plugin that provides rules and validation for component naming, helping you identify components that violate naming conventions and elements.


1. Selecting naming convention.

There are several conventions, let's select the best one for your project.


2. Entering naming elements.

Next, you can enter "words" that makes up the component's name.

Enter a comma between words to set multiple words.

Maruco guesses that the component's name is made up of three elements: a prefix, a middle word and a suffix.


3. Running validation.

That's all. Let's run the validation.
plugins.tagline: Effortless rule creation for component naming.

117124.name: Maruco
117124.description:

3. Running validation.

That's all. Let's run the validation.
117124.tagline: Effortless rule creation for component naming.

plugins.name: 数据生成图表可视化工具（专业版） Data Vision Chart Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin enables users to create beautiful and interactive charts directly within Figma. Whether you need a bar, line, donut, or pie chart, the plugin offers real-time updates and customizable styles for seamless data visualization.


Function Description

  1. Create different chart types: Line, Bar, Donut, and Pie charts.
  2. Customize chart styles with predefined themes or use custom colors.
  3. Easily add, edit, and remove data rows with an intuitive interface.
  4. Export generated charts directly as Figma frames for further design use.
  5. Support for multiple languages, including English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Hindi, Japanese, and Korean.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select the chart type you want to create.
  2. Input the required data and choose a predefined color scheme or customize it.
  3. Set the chart dimensions (width and height) as per your design needs.
  4. Click "Generate Chart" to create the chart frame in Figma.
  5. Customize the chart further by adjusting colors and data points as needed.


Notes

  1. The plugin supports dynamic data updates and real-time chart previews.
  2. Ensure that all necessary data rows are filled to avoid incomplete chart generation.
  3. You can switch between chart types to explore different data visualizations.


介绍

此插件让用户可以直接在 Figma 中创建漂亮且交互式的图表。无论是柱状图、折线图、环形图还是饼图，插件都提供实时更新和自定义样式，助力轻松进行数据可视化。


功能说明

  1. 支持生成不同类型的图表：折线图、柱状图、环形图和饼图。
  2. 提供多种预设主题配色，或使用自定义颜色。
  3. 直观界面，轻松添加、编辑和删除数据行。
  4. 将生成的图表直接导出为 Figma 的框架，用于后续设计。
  5. 支持多种语言，包括英语、简体中文、繁体中文、印地语、日语和韩语。


使用方法

  1. 选择您需要创建的图表类型。
  2. 输入所需数据，选择预设配色或自定义颜色。
  3. 根据设计需要设置图表尺寸（宽度和高度）。
  4. 点击“生成图表”按钮，即可在 Figma 中创建图表框架。
  5. 您可以根据需要进一步调整图表的颜色和数据点。


注意事项

  1. 插件支持动态数据更新和实时图表预览。
  2. 确保所有必要的数据行已填写完整，以避免生成不完整的图表。
  3. 您可以在不同的图表类型之间切换，探索不同的数据可视化效果。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Generate stunning charts for data visualization with ease

plugins.name: BlendAI
plugins.description:
BlendAI seamlessly integrates with Figma to let you generate high-quality images from text prompts or combine up to three reference images in a single click. It’s perfect for product mockups, hero banners, packshots, concept art, backgrounds, or quick visual inspiration—without ever leaving your Figma file.


Key Features:

• Simple prompt → image

Type a natural-language description and instantly receive a crisp, AI-rendered result.

• Multi-reference blending

Upload up to three reference images (for example: a product shot, a texture, and a background) and instruct BlendAI to place, style, or combine them.

Example: “Place @IMG_1 in front of @IMG_2 with the lighting mood of @IMG_3.”

• Six aspect-ratio presets

1:1 (Square), 16:9 (Landscape), 9:16 (Portrait), 4:3 (Classic), 3:4 (Portrait), 21:9 (Ultrawide)

• Instant one-click generation

No manual exports or workarounds—everything happens directly in Figma’s interface.

• Credit-based system

Includes a free 10-image starter pack. Easily top up credits from the “Get More” menu.

• History & quick re-use

View, revisit, and re-generate past images directly within the plugin.


BlendAI was built for designers who need on-the-fly visuals—whether it’s a quick hero image for a mockup, a polished packshot for a product page, or a fully blended scene combining multiple photo references. Try it free, then unlock larger credit packs for heavy usage.
plugins.tagline: AI image generation & multi-reference blending inside Figma for hero banners, mockups or backgrounds

136150.name: BlendAI
136150.description:
BlendAI seamlessly integrates with Figma to let you generate high-quality images from text prompts or combine up to three reference images in a single click. It’s perfect for product mockups, hero banners, packshots, concept art, backgrounds, or quick visual inspiration—without ever leaving your Figma file.


Key Features:

• Simple prompt → image

Type a natural-language description and instantly receive a crisp, AI-rendered result.

• Multi-reference blending

Upload up to three reference images (for example: a product shot, a texture, and a background) and instruct BlendAI to place, style, or combine them.

Example: “Place @IMG_1 in front of @IMG_2 with the lighting mood of @IMG_3.”

• Six aspect-ratio presets

1:1 (Square), 16:9 (Landscape), 9:16 (Portrait), 4:3 (Classic), 3:4 (Portrait), 21:9 (Ultrawide)

• Instant one-click generation

No manual exports or workarounds—everything happens directly in Figma’s interface.

• Credit-based system

Includes a free 10-image starter pack. Easily top up credits from the “Get More” menu.

• History & quick re-use

View, revisit, and re-generate past images directly within the plugin.


BlendAI was built for designers who need on-the-fly visuals—whether it’s a quick hero image for a mockup, a polished packshot for a product page, or a fully blended scene combining multiple photo references. Try it free, then unlock larger credit packs for heavy usage.

networkAccess.reasoning: Proxy to Runway Gen-4 References API

136150.tagline: AI image generation & multi-reference blending inside Figma for hero banners, mockups or backgrounds

plugins.name: Token Architect
plugins.description:
Token Architect is a comprehensive design token management solution that bridges the gap between Figma and your development workflow. Create, export, and import design tokens with intelligent automation and bidirectional sync capabilities.


KEY FEATURES:

  1. Generate Complete Token Systems - Create comprehensive design tokens from a single brand colour with automatic shade generation
  2. Smart Color Palette Generation - Transform any colour into professional 100-900 shade scales with HSL-based algorithms
  3. Export Figma Variables - Convert your Figma variables into industry-standard JSON tokens
  4. Import External Tokens - Bring design tokens from popular tools (Style Dictionary, Design Tokens W3C) into Figma
  5. Advanced Token Classification - Automatic organisation into primitives and semantic token hierarchies
  6. Multi-Category Support - Colours, spacing, typography, responsive breakpoints, and semantic tokens
  7. Real-time Preview & Validation - Live JSON output with comprehensive debugging capabilities


PERFECT FOR:

  1. Design system managers building tokens from scratch or maintaining consistency
  2. Frontend developers implementing design tokens in modern frameworks
  3. Teams using tools like Style Dictionary, Tokens Studio, or custom token pipelines
  4. Organisations scaling design systems across products and platforms



Please reach out to ozarg.studio@gmail.com if you have any issues or would like to request a feature. Or let's connect on LinkedIn. Cool ideas welcome :)

accepted.name: OZAR STUDIO
accepted.description: We are a design studio working worldwide . We provide a range of services and  offer a series of products for businesses you can access from our website.

plugins.tagline: Export and Import your variables in a developer-friendy way

plugins.name: Timestamp
plugins.description:
Timestamp is a lightweight plugin that renames selected frame(s) with the current date and time (like 05/29/2025 @ 8:15 PM). It’s perfect for marking work as done, tracking updates, or handing off designs with a clear time log.


Just select your frames, run the plugin, and click to rename ✨ A simple way to stay organized and keep your version history crystal clear.
plugins.tagline: Rename selected frames with the current date and time.

plugins.name: Code Craft
plugins.description: Convert your Figma designs into AI-friendly JSON to enhance prompt quality and accelerate code generation. With built-in image detection and download, your visuals are captured seamlessly. Output files are structured and optimized—ready to send to AI agents for fast, accurate implementation. Transform your design into clean, usable code in minutes — no manual handoff, no guesswork.

accepted.name: Artem Svitelskyi
accepted.description: I’m a UX Designer with 10+ years of creating seamless user experiences. My engineering roots sharpen my precision and creativity in turning ideas into results.

plugins.tagline: From Figma to code — smart, fast, and AI-ready.

plugins.name: Panto: Rename Variables in a Snap!
plugins.description: Tired of manually renaming variable prefixes one by one? Panto is here to streamline your workflow! This powerful yet simple plugin allows you to batch rename the initial segment of your Figma variable names.
plugins.tagline: Batch Rename Variables, Simplified
